item.title: Backup and Restore Volumes of a DaemonSet | Stash
item.description: Backup and Restore Volumes of a DaemonSet This guide will show you how to use Stash to backup and restore volumes of a DaemonSet. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster. If you do not already have a cluster, you can create one by using Minikube. Install Stash in your cluster following the steps here.
